import { useState } from 'react'; import TitlePage from '../../components/TitlePage' import { InputGroup, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const clients =[ { id:1, nome:"Microsoft", responsavel:"Bill Gates", telefone:"(11) 99999-9999", situacao:"Ativo", }, { id:2, nome:"Google", responsavel:"Larry Page", telefone:"(11) 99999-9999", situacao:"Ativo", }, { id:3, nome:"Apple", responsavel:"Steve Jobs", telefone:"(11) 99999-9999", situacao:"Ativo", }, { id:4, nome:"Facebook", responsavel:"Mark Zuckerberg", telefone:"(11) 99999-9999", situacao:"Ativo", }, { id:5, nome:"Amazon", responsavel:"Jeff Bezos", telefone:"(11) 99999-9999", situacao:"Ativo", } ] export default function ClientList() { const [termoBusca, setTermoBusca] = useState(""); const handleInputChange = (event) => { setTermoBusca(event.target.value); } const filteredClients = clients.filter((client) => { //return client.nome.toLowerCase().includes(termoBusca.toLowerCase()) //return client.nome.toLowerCase().indexOf(termoBusca.toLowerCase()) !== -1 return Object.values(client).join("").toLowerCase().includes(termoBusca.toLowerCase()); }); return ( <> Buscar: {filteredClients.map((client)=>( ))}
# Nome Responsavel Situação Opções
{client.id} {client.nome} {client.responsavel} {client.situacao}
) }
